body: Tom Lasseter from China rises writes an update on the death of Qian Yunhui. The court has presented a video that recorded from Qian's watch showing how he was hit by the truck.
original_body: Tom Lasseter from China rises writes an update on the death of Qian Yunhui. The court has presented a video that recorded from Qian's watch showing how he was hit by the truck.
title: China: Update on the death of village head
